#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtPkYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_PK_ORD = #{tgtPkOrd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TGT_NONUL_YN = #{tgtNonulYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DMN_ID = #{tgtDmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DMN_PNM = #{tgtDmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DMN_LNM = #{tgtDmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_BIZ_ID = #{srcBizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_BIZ_NM = #{srcBizNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_SYS_ID = SRC_TBL_LNM = #{srcTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_PNM = #{srcTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_COL_LNM = #{srcColLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_COL_PNM = #{srcColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_DESCN = #{colRefTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JN_CND_NM = #{jnCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_CRGP_ID = #{appCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_CRGP_NM = #{appCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CNVS_CRGP_ID = #{cnvsCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CNVS_CRGP_NM = #{cnvsCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_CHRG = #{tgtChrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
SELECT /* WaqColMapMapper.selectColMapListbyMst */ A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.OBJ_VERS, A.OBJ_DESCN , A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , A.COL_MAP_ID, A.TBL_MAP_ID, A.MAP_DF_ID, A.MAP_DF_TYPE, A.COL_MAP_TYPE, A.TGT_SUBJ_ID, A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH , A.TGT_DB_ID, A.TGT_DB_PNM, A.TGT_TBL_ID, A.TGT_TBL_LNM, A.TGT_TBL_PNM, A.TGT_COL_ID, A.TGT_COL_LNM , A.TGT_COL_PNM, A.TGT_DATA_TYPE, A.TGT_DATA_LEN, A.TGT_SCAL, A.TGT_PK_YN, A.TGT_PK_ORD, A.TGT_NONUL_YN , A.TGT_DMN_ID, A.TGT_DMN_PNM, A.TGT_DMN_LNM, A.SRC_BIZ_ID, A.SRC_BIZ_NM, A.SRC_SYS_ID, A.SRC_SYS_NM, A.SRC_DB_ID, A.SRC_DB_PNM , A.SRC_TBL_ID, A.SRC_TBL_LNM, A.SRC_TBL_PNM, A.SRC_COL_LNM, A.SRC_COL_PNM, A.SRC_DESCN, A.SRC_DATA_TYPE, A.SRC_DATA_LEN , A.SRC_SCAL, A.COL_ORD, A.DEFLT_VAL, A.MAP_CND_NM, A.COL_REF_DB_PNM, A.COL_REF_TBL_PNM, A.JN_CND_NM , A.APP_CRGP_ID, A.APP_CRGP_NM, A.CNVS_CRGP_ID, A.CNVS_CRGP_NM, A.TGT_CHRG
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor FROM WAQ_COL_MAP A LEFT JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqColMapMapper.updateCheckInit */ WAQ_COL_MAP A LEFT JOIN WAM_COL_MAP B ON B.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND B.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND IFNULL(B.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(B.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(B.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') SET A.COL_MAP_ID = B.COL_MAP_ID , A.REG_TYP_CD = CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN B.COL_MAP_ID IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END , A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE /* WaqColMapMapper.updateSrcInfotoBlank */ WAQ_COL_MAP A SET A.SRC_BIZ_ID = '', A.SRC_BIZ_NM = '', A.SRC_SYS_ID = '', A.SRC_SYS_NM = '', A.SRC_DB_ID = '', A.SRC_DB_PNM = '', A.SRC_TBL_ID = '', A.SRC_TBL_LNM = '', A.SRC_TBL_PNM = '', A.SRC_COL_LNM = '', A.SRC_COL_PNM = '', A.SRC_DESCN = '', A.SRC_DATA_TYPE = '' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND IFNULL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE,'1') = '2'

UPDATE /* WaqColMapMapper.updateTgtSubjInfoForXlsU */ WAQ_COL_MAP A LEFT JOIN WAM_COL_MAP D ON D.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND D.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND IFNULL(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') SET A.TGT_SUBJ_ID = D.TGT_SUBJ_ID , A.TGT_TBL_LNM = D.TGT_TBL_LNM , A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH = D.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH IS NULL AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COL_MAP D WHERE D.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND D.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND IFNULL(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') )

UPDATE /* WaqColMapMapper.updateTgtSubjInfoForXlsC */ WAQ_COL_MAP A LEFT JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL B ON B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM SET A.TGT_SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID , A.TGT_TBL_LNM = B.PDM_TBL_LNM , A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH = B.FULL_PATH WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM LIMIT 1 )

UPDATE /* WaqColMapMapper.updateTgtSubjInfo */ WAQ_COL_MAP A LEFT JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL B ON B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND B.FULL_PATH = IFNULL(A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH,'X') SET A.TGT_SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID , A.TGT_TBL_LNM = B.PDM_TBL_LNM WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND B.FULL_PATH = IFNULL(A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH,'X') )

UPDATE /* WaqColMapMapper.updateTgtDbInfo */ WAQ_COL_MAP A LEFT JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL B ON B.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_SCH C ON C.DB_SCH_ID = B.DB_SCH_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D ON D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = IFNULL(A.TGT_DB_PNM,'X') SET A.TGT_DB_ID = D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID , A.TGT_TBL_ID = B.PDM_TBL_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_TBL B INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH C ON C.DB_SCH_ID = B.DB_SCH_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D ON D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.DDL_TBL_PNM = A.TGT_TBL_PNM AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = IFNULL(A.TGT_DB_PNM,'X') )

UPDATE /* WaqColMapMapper.updateTgtColInfo */ WAQ_COL_MAP A LEFT JOIN WAM_PDM_COL C ON C.PDM_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND C.PDM_TBL_ID = A.TGT_TBL_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT D.SDITM_ID, E.DMN_ID, E.DMN_LNM, E.DMN_PNM FROM WAM_SDITM D INNER JOIN WAM_DMN E ON D.DMN_ID = E.DMN_ID ) F ON C.SDITM_ID = F.SDITM_ID SET A.TGT_COL_ID = C.PDM_COL_ID , A.TGT_COL_LNM = C.PDM_COL_LNM , A.TGT_DATA_TYPE = CASE WHEN C.DATA_LEN IS NULL THEN C.DATA_TYPE ELSE (CASE WHEN C.DATA_SCAL IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(C.DATA_TYPE, '(', C.DATA_LEN, ', ', C.DATA_SCAL,')') ELSE CONCAT(C.DATA_TYPE, '(', C.DATA_LEN, ')') END ) END , A.TGT_PK_YN = C.PK_YN , A.TGT_PK_ORD = C.PK_ORD , A.TGT_NONUL_YN = C.NONUL_YN , A.TGT_DMN_ID = F.DMN_ID , A.TGT_DMN_PNM = F.DMN_PNM , A.TGT_DMN_LNM = F.DMN_LNM , A.COL_ORD = C.COL_ORD WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_COL C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT D.SDITM_ID, E.DMN_ID, E.DMN_LNM, E.DMN_PNM FROM WAM_SDITM D INNER JOIN WAM_DMN E ON D.DMN_ID = E.DMN_ID ) F ON C.SDITM_ID = F.SDITM_ID WHERE C.PDM_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND C.PDM_TBL_ID = A.TGT_TBL_ID )

UPDATE /* WaqColMapMapper.updateTgtTblId */ WAQ_COL_MAP A LEFT JOIN WAM_TBL_MAP C ON C.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND IFNULL(C.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(C.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') SET A.TBL_MAP_ID = C.TBL_MAP_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_TBL_MAP C WHERE C.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND IFNULL(C.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(C.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') )
mapper.insert:
/* WaqColMapMapper.checkDupTblMap */
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_COL_MAP D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND D.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND D.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND IFNULL(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)

/* WaqColMapMapper.checkNotExistColMap */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COL_MAP D WHERE D.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND D.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND IFNULL(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') )

/* WaqColMapMapper.checkRequestTblMap */
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_COL_MAP D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO LEFT JOIN WAM_TBL_MAP T ON T.MAP_DF_ID = D.MAP_DF_ID WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND D.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND D.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND IFNULL(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' AND T.TBL_MAP_TYPE = 'M' )

/* WaqColMapMapper.checkNotExistSrcTbl */
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ASIS_PDM_TBL D WHERE A.SRC_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_TBL_MAP M WHERE A.SRC_TBL_PNM = M.TGT_TBL_PNM ) AND IFNULL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE,'1') != '2'

/* WaqColMapMapper.checkNotExistSrcCol */
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_ASIS_PDM_COL D WHERE A.SRC_COL_PNM = D.PDM_COL_PNM UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COL_MAP M WHERE A.SRC_COL_PNM = M.TGT_COL_PNM UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_COL_MAP Q WHERE A.SRC_COL_PNM = Q.TGT_COL_PNM AND A.RQST_NO = Q.RQST_NO ) AND IFNULL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE,'1') != '2'

/* WaqColMapMapper.checkNotExistMapJoin */
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.MAP_CND_NM IS NULL AND IFNULL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE,'1') = '1'

/* WaqColMapMapper.checkExistOmittedTgtCol */
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_COL D INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL F ON D.PDM_TBL_ID = F.PDM_TBL_ID WHERE A.TGT_TBL_PNM = F.PDM_TBL_PNM AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_COL_MAP E WHERE E.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND E.TGT_COL_PNM = D.PDM_COL_PNM ) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COL_MAP G WHERE A.MAP_DF_ID = G.MAP_DF_ID AND A.SRC_TBL_PNM = G.SRC_TBL_PNM)

/* WaqColMapMapper.checkNotExistTgtMapTbl */
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_TBL_MAP D WHERE A.MAP_DF_ID = D.MAP_DF_ID AND A.TGT_TBL_PNM = D.TGT_TBL_PNM )

/* WaqColMapMapper.checkExistOmittedSrcInfo */
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND IFNULL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE,'1') != '2' AND ( IFNULL(A.SRC_BIZ_NM, 'X') = 'X' OR IFNULL(A.SRC_SYS_NM, 'X') = 'X' OR IFNULL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = 'X' OR IFNULL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = 'X' OR IFNULL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = 'X' OR IFNULL(A.SRC_DATA_TYPE, 'X') = 'X' )

/* WaqColMapMapper.checkOmittedDefltVal */
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND IFNULL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE,'1') = '1' AND A.TGT_NONUL_YN = 'Y' AND A.TGT_PK_YN != 'Y' AND A.DEFLT_VAL IS NULL

/* WaqColMapMapper.checkNotChgData */
AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_COL_MAP D WHERE D.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND D.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND IFNULL(D.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_DB_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(D.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(D.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') = IFNULL(A.SRC_COL_PNM, 'X') AND IFNULL(A.COL_MAP_TYPE, '_') = IFNULL(D.COL_MAP_TYPE, '_') AND IFNULL(A.TGT_SUBJ_ID, '_') = IFNULL(D.TGT_SUBJ_ID, '_') AND IFNULL(A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH, '_') = IFNULL(D.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH, '_') AND IFNULL(A.TGT_TBL_LNM, '_') = IFNULL(D.TGT_TBL_LNM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.TGT_COL_LNM, '_') = IFNULL(D.TGT_COL_LNM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.TGT_DATA_TYPE, '_') = IFNULL(D.TGT_DATA_TYPE, '_') AND IFNULL(A.TGT_PK_YN, '_') = IFNULL(D.TGT_PK_YN, '_') AND IFNULL(A.TGT_NONUL_YN, '_') = IFNULL(D.TGT_NONUL_YN, '_') AND IFNULL(A.TGT_DMN_LNM, '_') = IFNULL(D.TGT_DMN_LNM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.SRC_BIZ_NM, '_') = IFNULL(D.SRC_BIZ_NM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.SRC_SYS_NM, '_') = IFNULL(D.SRC_SYS_NM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.SRC_TBL_LNM, '_') = IFNULL(D.SRC_TBL_LNM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.SRC_COL_LNM, '_') = IFNULL(D.SRC_COL_LNM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.SRC_DESCN, '_') = IFNULL(D.SRC_DESCN, '_') AND IFNULL(A.SRC_DATA_TYPE, '_') = IFNULL(D.SRC_DATA_TYPE, '_') AND IFNULL(A.COL_ORD, 1 ) = IFNULL(D.COL_ORD, 1 ) AND IFNULL(A.DEFLT_VAL, '_') = IFNULL(D.DEFLT_VAL, '_') AND IFNULL(A.MAP_CND_NM, '_') = IFNULL(D.MAP_CND_NM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.COL_REF_DB_PNM, '_') = IFNULL(D.COL_REF_DB_PNM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.COL_REF_TBL_PNM, '_') = IFNULL(D.COL_REF_TBL_PNM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.JN_CND_NM, '_') = IFNULL(D.JN_CND_NM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.MAP_CND_NM, '_') = IFNULL(D.MAP_CND_NM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.MAP_CND_NM, '_') = IFNULL(D.MAP_CND_NM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.APP_CRGP_NM, '_') = IFNULL(D.APP_CRGP_NM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.CNVS_CRGP_NM, '_') = IFNULL(D.CNVS_CRGP_NM, '_') AND IFNULL(A.TGT_CHRG, '_') = IFNULL(D.TGT_CHRG, '_') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* WaqColMapMapper.updatervwStsCd */ WAQ_COL_MAP
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = NOW() , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND IFNULL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.select: SELECT /* WaqColMapMapper.selectWaqC */ * FROM WAQ_COL_MAP WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.delete:
DELETE A /* WaqColMapMapper.deleteWAM */ FROM WAM_COL_MAP A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_COL_MAP B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND B.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND B.COL_MAP_ID = A.COL_MAP_ID
)
mapper.insert:
INSERT /* WaqColMapMapper.insertWAM */ INTO WAM_COL_MAP SELECT COL_MAP_ID
FROM WAQ_COL_MAP A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* WaqColMapMapper.updateWAH */ WAH_COL_MAP A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_COL_MAP B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.MAP_DF_ID = A.MAP_DF_ID AND B.TGT_COL_PNM = A.TGT_COL_PNM AND B.COL_MAP_ID = A.COL_MAP_ID
) AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert:
INSERT /* WaqColMapMapper.insertWAH */ INTO WAH_COL_MAP SELECT A.COL_MAP_ID AS COL_MAP_ID , STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AS EXP_DTM , NOW() AS STR_DTM
FROM WAQ_COL_MAP A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.select:
SELECT /* WaqColMapMapper.selectwamlist */ (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_COL_MAP WHERE RQST_NO = #{reqmst.rqstNo} ) + ROWNUM AS RQST_SNO , 'I' AS IBS_STATUS , A.COL_MAP_ID , A.TBL_MAP_ID , #{reqmst.rqstDcd} AS RQST_DCD , A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.OBJ_VERS, A.OBJ_DESCN , A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , A.MAP_DF_ID, A.TBL_MAP_ID, B.MAP_DF_TYPE, A.COL_MAP_TYPE, A.TGT_SUBJ_ID, A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH , A.TGT_DB_ID, A.TGT_DB_PNM, A.TGT_TBL_ID, A.TGT_TBL_LNM, A.TGT_TBL_PNM, A.TGT_COL_ID, A.TGT_COL_LNM , A.TGT_COL_PNM, A.TGT_DATA_TYPE, A.TGT_DATA_LEN, A.TGT_SCAL, A.TGT_PK_YN, A.TGT_PK_ORD, A.TGT_NONUL_YN , A.TGT_DMN_ID, A.TGT_DMN_PNM, A.TGT_DMN_LNM, A.SRC_BIZ_ID, A.SRC_BIZ_NM, A.SRC_SYS_ID, A.SRC_SYS_NM , A.SRC_DB_ID, A.SRC_DB_PNM, A.SRC_TBL_ID, A.SRC_TBL_LNM, A.SRC_TBL_PNM, A.SRC_COL_LNM, A.SRC_COL_PNM , A.SRC_DESCN, A.SRC_DATA_TYPE, A.SRC_DATA_LEN, A.SRC_SCAL, A.COL_ORD, A.DEFLT_VAL, A.MAP_CND_NM , A.COL_REF_DB_PNM, A.COL_REF_TBL_PNM, A.JN_CND_NM, A.APP_CRGP_ID, A.APP_CRGP_NM, A.CNVS_CRGP_ID, A.TGT_CHRG FROM WAM_COL_MAP A INNER JOIN WAM_TBL_MAP B ON A.MAP_DF_ID = B.MAP_DF_ID AND IFNULL2(A.SRC_TBL_PNM,A.SRC_TBL_PNM,'X') = IFNULL2(A.SRC_TBL_PNM,B.SRC_TBL_PNM,'X') WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.TBL_MAP_ID IN
#{item.tblMapId}

SELECT /* WaqColMapMapper.selectTgtColListbyNm */ B.PDM_TBL_ID AS TGT_TBL_ID, B.PDM_TBL_PNM AS TGT_TBL_PNM, B.PDM_TBL_LNM AS TGT_TBL_LNM, B.SUBJ_ID AS TGT_SUBJ_ID, B.FULL_PATH AS TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH, C.PDM_COL_ID AS TGT_COL_ID, C.PDM_COL_PNM AS TGT_COL_PNM, C.PDM_COL_LNM AS TGT_COL_LNM, -- CONCAT_DATATYPE(C.DATA_TYPE, C.DATA_LEN, C.DATA_SCAL) AS TGT_DATA_TYPE , CASE WHEN C.DATA_LEN IS NULL THEN C.DATA_TYPE ELSE (CASE WHEN DATA_SCAL IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(C.DATA_TYPE, '(', C.DATA_LEN, ', ', C.DATA_SCAL, ')') ELSE CONCAT(C.DATA_TYPE, '(', C.DATA_LEN, ')') END ) END AS DATA_TYPE, C.PK_YN AS TGT_PK_YN, C.PK_ORD AS TGT_PK_ORD, C.NONUL_YN AS TGT_NONUL_YN, F.DMN_ID AS TGT_DMN_ID, F.DMN_PNM AS TGT_DMN_PNM, F.DMN_LNM AS TGT_DMN_LNM, C.COL_ORD AS COL_ORD FROM WAM_TBL_MAP M INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL B ON M.TGT_TBL_PNM = B.PDM_TBL_PNM AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL C ON B.PDM_TBL_ID = C.PDM_TBL_ID AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT D.SDITM_ID, E.DMN_ID, E.DMN_LNM, E.DMN_PNM FROM WAM_SDITM D INNER JOIN WAM_DMN E ON D.DMN_ID = E.DMN_ID ) F ON C.SDITM_ID = F.SDITM_ID
AND (C.PDM_COL_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tgtColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') OR C.PDM_COL_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tgtColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND (B.PDM_TBL_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') OR B.PDM_TBL_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
ORDER BY B.PDM_TBL_PNM ,C.COL_ORD
